title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú) (Uimh. 3), 2022 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 3) 2022 ghairm den ordu seo

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá na limistéir a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 6 Meán Fómhair, 2022, 
á rá go ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: Bearna agus Cnoc na Cathrach, Co. na 
Gaillimhe 

SCEIDEAL 

[433] 3 

(1) An chuid sin de thoghroinn cheantair Bhearna i gcontae na Gaillimhe atá 
comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: Áth an Ghlugair, Na 
hAcraí Corra, An Aill, An tÁth Buí, Áit Tí Seonac, An Baile Ard Thiar, 
An Baile Ard Thoir, An Baile Nua, Baile an Bhrúnaigh, An Bhuaile 
Bheag Thiar, An Bhuaile Bheag Thoir, Buaile na Sruthán, An Chloch 
Scoilte, Cnoc Odhráin, An Cnocán Carrach, An Chorrbhuaile (Lynch), 
An Chorrbhuaile (Morgan), Corr Chuilinn, An Droim Thiar, An Droim 
Thoir, Na Foraí Maola Thiar, Na Foraí Maola Thoir, Rinn na Mara, An 
Leac Liath, An Léana Riabhach, Lisín an Chaoráin, Loch Inse, An 
Pollach, An Chéibh, Tóin na Brocaí, Troscaigh Thiar agus Troscaigh 
Thoir. 

(2) An chuid sin de thoghroinn Cheathrú Bhearna i gceantar uirbeach na 
Gaillimhe atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: An 
Cheapach, Baile na hAbhann, Baile na mBúrcach, An Léana Bodhar, An 
Coimín Mór, Baile an Mhóinín Thoir, Cluain na nGabhar (cuid), Gort na 
Leice, An Seanbhaile Dubh (cuid), Seanghort (cuid), Bearna (cuid) agus 
Baile an Mhóinín Thiar. 

(3) An chuid sin de thoghroinn cheantair Chnoc na Cathrach i gceantar 
uirbeach na Gaillimhe atá comhdhéanta de na bailte fearainn seo a leanas: 
Cluain na nGabhar (cuid), An Seanbhaile Dubh (cuid), Seanghort (cuid), 
Bearna (cuid) agus An Roisín. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [433] 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh,, 
 25 Lúnasa 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, 

Spóirt agus Meán 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[433] 5 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 433 of 2022 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [433] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 433 of 2022 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2022 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:

oifigiuil 6 mean fomhair 2022 ra go ndearnadh ionstraim reachtuil seo limistear pleanala teanga bearna agus cnoc na cathrach co na gaillimhe sceideal 433 3 (1) chuid sin de thoghroinn cheantair bhearna gcontae na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas ath ghlugair na hacrai corra aill tath bui ait ti seonac baile ard thiar baile ard thoir baile nua baile bhrunaigh bhuaile bheag thiar bhuaile bheag thoir buaile na sruthan chloch scoilte cnoc odhrain cnocan carrach chorrbhuaile (lynch) chorrbhuaile (morgan) corr chuilinn droim thiar droim thoir na forai maola thiar na forai maola thoir rinn na mara leac liath leana riabhach lisin chaorain loch inse pollach cheibh toin na brocai troscaigh thiar agus troscaigh thoir (2) chuid sin de thoghroinn cheathru bhearna gceantar uirbeach na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas cheapach baile na habhann baile na mburcach leana bodhar coimin mor baile mhoinin thoir cluain na ngabhar (cuid) gort na leice seanbhaile dubh (cuid) seanghort (cuid) bearna (cuid) agus baile mhoinin thiar (3) chuid sin de thoghroinn cheantair chnoc na cathrach gceantar uirbeach na gaillimhe ata comhdheanta de na bailte fearainn seo leanas cluain na ngabhar (cuid) seanbhaile dubh (cuid) seanghort (cuid) bearna (cuid) agus roisin 4 433 arna thabhairt faoi mo laimh 25 lunasa 2022 jack chamber aire stait ag roinn title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No. 3) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 3) order 2022

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The areas specified in the Schedule are designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th September, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [433] 7 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: Language Planning Area: Bearna agus Cnoc na Cathrach, Co. Galway
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Language Planning Area: Bearna agus Cnoc na Cathrach, Co. Galway 

(1) That part of the electoral division area of Bearna in County Galway 
which consists of the following townlands: Áth an Ghlugair, Na hAcraí 
Corra, An Aill, An tÁth Buí, Áit Tí Seonac, An Baile Ard Thiar, An Baile 
Ard Thoir, An Baile Nua, Baile an Bhrúnaigh, An Bhuaile Bheag Thiar, 
An Bhuaile Bheag Thoir, Buaile na Sruthán, An Chloch Scoilte, Cnoc 
Odhráin, An Cnocán Carrach, An Chorrbhuaile 
(Lynch), An 
Chorrbhuaile (Morgan), Corr Chuilinn, An Droim Thiar, An Droim 
Thoir, Na Foraí Maola Thiar, Na Foraí Maola Thoir, Rinn na Mara, An 
Leac Liath, An Léana Riabhach, Lisín an Chaoráin, Loch Inse, An 
Pollach, An Chéibh, Tóin na Brocaí, Troscaigh Thiar and Troscaigh 
Thoir. 

(2) That part of the electoral division area of Bearna in urban Galway which 
consists of the following townlands: An Cheapach, Baile na hAbhann, 
Baile na mBúrcach, An Léana Bodhar, An Coimín Mór, Baile an 
Mhóinín Thoir, Cluain na nGabhar (part), Gort na Leice, An Seanbhaile 
Dubh (part), Seanghort (part), Bearna (part) and Baile an Mhóinín Thiar. 

(3) That part of the electoral division area of Cnoc na Cathrach in urban 
Galway which consists of the following townlands: Cluain na nGabhar 
(part), An Seanbhaile Dubh (part), Seanghort (part), Bearna (part) and 
An Roisín. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8 [433] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 25 August 2022 

JACK CHAMBERS, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media
